import React, { useState } from 'react' import { Row, Col, Container, Collapse, Button } from 'react-bootstrap'; export default function StaggeredText() { const [open, setOpen] = useState(false); return (
onClick={() => setOpen(!open)} aria-controls="description" aria-expanded={open}> arrow_forward
Sign in to your account using your Virtusa employee ID and password.
Not a registered user yet? Sign up using your employee ID and a simple KYC process!

RIGHT SIDE
) }
